summary: Ancient Steps is a new DMCHomes mod that adds a player home to the Throat of the World. Adds a new map marker and a full interior home, including a storage room, a crafting room, and a bedroom.
descriptionHtml:
[img] https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-FrR_CZx92kU/UNy9Is6f3bI/AAAAAAAAAnY/GOLD3zchnxk/s800/01.png [/img]
[heading] Description [/heading]
Ancient Steps is a new DMCHomes mod that adds a player home to the Throat of the World. Adds a new map marker and a full interior home, including a storage room, a crafting room, and a bedroom.

From the author of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22876] Better Jorrvaskr [/url].

[heading] DMC-Homes Series [/heading]
[list]
[*] Home #1: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28379] Eagle’s Nest Retreat [/url]
[*] Home #2: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28396] Wrecked [/url]
[*] Home #3: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28612] Seaside Manor  [/url]
[*] Home #4: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28830] Wolf Rock [/url]
[*] Home #5: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29027] Golden Hill [/url] 
[*] Home #6: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29068] Hilltop Hideout [/url]
[*] Home #7: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29151] Ancient Steps [/url]
[*] Home #8: Hermit’s Hideaway [b][i][u] Coming Soon [/b][/i][/u]
[*] Home #9: Lost Archive [b][i][u] Coming Soon [/b][/i][/u]
[*] Home #10: Sailor’s Bliss [b][i][u] Coming Soon [/b][/i][/u]
[*] Home #11: Nomad Peak [b][i][u] Coming Soon [/b][/i][/u]
[*] Home #12: Ironhilt Mine [b][i][u] Coming Soon [/b][/i][/u]
[*] Home #13: Gleampeak Barrow [b][i][u] Coming Soon [/b][/i][/u]
[*] Home #14: Astroditch [b][i][u] Coming Soon [/b][/i][/u]
[*] Home #15: Loackmid Depths [b][i][u] Coming Soon [/b][/i][/u]
[/list]
[b] More Coming Soon [/b]
